subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
London Higher is an umbrella organization that represents higher education institutions in London. It is a membership association, a company limited by Guarantee with charitable status. Its aims are to promote and advocate higher education in London and to build and manage collaborations between its members with a view to addressing the challenges and opportunities of providing higher education in London. 
 
London Higher Europe (LHE) is an initiative operated by London Higher. It is a consortium of universities that seeks to develop strategic engagement between London universities and the European Union.
relevant_communication:
Early Career Reserachers Study Trip. We take out 7-10 young academics to Brussels to familiarise them with the EU and various funding opportunities (Dec 2017) 
 
Research Administrators Study Trip. We take out 7-10 research officers to Brussels to familiarise them with the EU and various funding opportunities (Jun 2017) 
 
University Research Directors' Delegation to Brussels to meet representatives from DG Research and the ERC (Mar 2016) 
 
Border Stories: From there to here. How innovative research into personal experiences can help the EU address Intra EU mobility and Third Country Migration (Feb 2016) 
 
University Research Administrators - Developing your EU funding skills: institutions, lobbying, funding and networks (July, Dec 2015 & Dec 2016) 
 
Future Proof Food: putting less in, getting more out – supply chain partnerships & the holistic approach to food sustainability (Feb 2015) 
 
Creative London - Digital hubs, platforms and networks for creative excellence (Nov 2014)
legal_status: Charity and Company Limited by Guarantee
